on reading compounds: 瑕瑾【カキン】scratch, chip, nick, flaw, fault, defect, shame, disgrace
kun reading compounds: 傷【きず】wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar, chip, crack, scratch, nick, flaw, defect, weakness, weak point, stain (on one's reputation), disgrace, dishonor, dishonour, (emotional) hurt, hurt feelings
